approve(address,uint256).details: This function is not supported and will always revert.

approveDelegation(address,uint256).details: Approves a debt allowance for a delegatee.

params.amount: The amount of the debt allowance.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract with the name, symbol and authority.

debtAllowance(address,address).details: Returns the debt allowance of a delegatee from a delegator.

returns._0: The debt allowance of the delegatee from the delegator.

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5.05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the default value returned by this function, unless it's overridden. NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

delegationWithSig(address,address,uint25.details: Approves a debt allowance for a delegatee with a signature.

params.r: The r component of the signature.
params.s: The s component of the signature.
params.v: The v component of the signature.
params.value: The value of the debt allowance.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

nonces(address).details: Returns the next unused nonce for an address.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

transfer(address,uint256).details: This function is not supported and will always revert.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: This function is not supported and will always revert.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approves a spender for an owner.

debtAllowance(address,address).notice: Gets the debt allowance of a delegatee from a delegator.

delegationWithSig(address,address,uint25.notice: Approves a debt allowance with a signature.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers tokens from a sender to a recipient.
